Method Detail

record

public MediaInfo record(HasNetworkId networkInfo)
                 throws BadRequestException,
                        ResourceNotFoundException,
                        BadGatewayException
Description copied from interface: MediaTemplate
This method causes the specified networkid to be called and played a "record greeting" prompt. The status of the recording can subsequently be determined by calling the "media status" method and supplying the appropriate Media ID

Specified by:
record in interface MediaTemplate
Parameters:
networkInfo - The network id to be called
Returns:
MediaInfo when record request had been accepted
Throws:
BadRequestException - Missing parameter(s)
ResourceNotFoundException - The application key is invalid or the application is not associated with the networkid.
BadGatewayException - Unable to initiate phone call at this time.

grantUpload

public UploadInfo grantUpload()
                       throws BadRequestException,
                              ResourceNotFoundException,
                              BadGatewayException
Description copied from interface: MediaTemplate
This method is used to request permission to upload a file. To use this method, the application must first obtain a media ID. When successful, this method returns a grant code that may be used to perform a single file upload. The grant code is valid for twenty-four hours after issuance.

Specified by:
grantUpload in interface MediaTemplate
Returns:
UploadInfo encapsulating the information about Upload Grant
Throws:
BadRequestException - Missing parameter(s)
ResourceNotFoundException - The application key is invalid or the application is not associated with the networkid.
BadGatewayException - Unable to initiate phone call at this time.

status

public MediaInfo status()
Description copied from interface: MediaTemplate
This method retrieves status information about the Media ID and the operation in progress, if any.

Specified by:
status in interface MediaTemplate
Returns:
MediaInfo if the media id is valid and content is found against that media id
